channel.title: Should I Buy This Headset?
channel.description:
Hey, there is a super awesome deal on a Swedish site where they're selling the Roccat Kulo USB Virtual 7.1 headset for ~35 USD (Original price is ~110 USD), is this a good headset and should I buy it?
Edit: [url]https://www.komplett.se/k/ki.aspx?sku=635218[/url]
[url]https://www.roccat.org/Products/Gaming-Sound/ROCCAT-Kulo-7-1-USB/[/url]

item.title: Should I Buy This Headset?
item.dc:creator: mankyman6
item.description:
Meh, it’s only virtual 7.1
Besides, if it’s for gaming, all you really need are a good pair of stereo headphones.

If you’re set on surround sound headphones though, go with Razer Tiamats. They’re expensive but they’re actual analog 7.1 (Granted, the mic isn’t the most well-built)

Read full topic
